name: Quick Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish that's quick, creamy, and satisfying
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions (usually 8-10 minutes)
While pasta cooks, beat eggs in a bowl and mix in grated parmesan
Mince garlic and sauté in butter in a large frying pan
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
Remove pan from heat, add hot pasta to the garlic butter
Quickly pour in egg mixture, tossing constantly to coat pasta
Add pasta water a little at a time until creamy
Season generously with black pepper and salt
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and chopped parsley
tips: Work quickly when adding eggs to prevent scrambling
The pasta water helps create a creamy sauce
Use freshly grated parmesan for best flavor
